briefdescription.para: Macro for creating a IDS instance.
Macro for creating channel bitmask associated with specified channel index.

memberdef.argsstring: (nrfx_ids_t const *p_instance, uint8_t interrupt_priority, nrfx_ids_event_handler_t event_handler, void *p_context, void const *p_config)
memberdef.name: nrfx_ids_init

briefdescription.para: Symbol specifying maximum number of available events triggered.

detaileddescription.para: Function for initializing the IDS instance.

parameterdescription.para: Function to be called on interrupt.
Context passed to the event handler.
Pointer to the structure containing peripheral-specific configuration. Can be NULL.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the IDS instance.
Function for enabling specified interrupts in the IDS instance.

parameterdescription.para: Mask of interrupts to be enabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling interrupt in the IDS instance.

parameterdescription.para: Mask of interrupts to be disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for conveying the inter-domain signal to the specified domain.

parameterdescription.para: Domain to be signalled. May be NULL for peripherals that have only one connection.
Inter-domain channel for conveying the signal.
